TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientSettingsProvider extends System.Configuration.SettingsProvider implements class System.Configuration.IApplicationSettingsProvider
Public Class ClientSettingsProvider Inherits SettingsProvider Implements IApplicationSettingsProvider
type ClientSettingsProvider = class inherit SettingsProvider interface IApplicationSettingsProvider

summary.span: 使基于 Windows 的应用程序可以从 Web 设置服务中检索用户设置。

span.span: Enables Windows-based applications to retrieve user settings from a Web settings service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过将应用程序配置为使用 类，可以使用客户端应用程序服务从现有的 Web 设置服务中检索用户设置。You can use client application services to retrieve user settings from an existing Web settings service by configuring your application to use the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services). 配置后，可以通过从 派生并将配置为使用 类的应用程序设置类来获取和设置用户设置。After configuration, you can get and set user settings through an application settings class derived from and configured to use the class. 你可以使用 Visual Studio 为你的项目生成 `Settings` 类（作为中的 `Properties.Settings.Default` 访问 C# Visual Basic 中的 `My.Settings`）。You can use Visual Studio to generate a `Settings` class for your project (accessed as `Properties.Settings.Default` in C# and `My.Settings` in Visual Basic). 有关应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序设置概述](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview)。For more information about application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview). 您可以使用完全限定的 类名作为键，通过 属性检索当前 。You can retrieve the current through the property using the fully-qualified class name as a key. 您还可以在处理 事件时通过 属性检索该提供程序。You can also retrieve the provider through the property when you handle the event. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含类级别的 ，适用于类的所有成员。This class contains a at the class level that applies to all members of the class. 如果直接调用方是安全透明的或部分受信任的，则会引发运行时异常。A run-time exception is thrown if the immediate caller is security-transparent or partially trusted. 有关安全关键类型和成员的详细信息，请参阅[安全透明代码，级别 2](/dotnet/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2)。For more information about security-critical types and members, see [Security-Transparent Code, Level 2](/dotnet/framework/misc/security-transparent-code-level-2). > [!NOTE] > 此类包含类级别的继承要求，该要求适用于所有成员。This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当派生类不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此事件来显示未成功保存的设置的列表。The following example code demonstrates how to use this event to display a list of settings that were not successfully saved. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#304)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#304)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由应用程序设置系统在内部使用，不应由应用程序代码使用。This method is used internally by the application settings system and it not meant to be used by your application code. [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 扩展性模型通过使用应用程序配置文件中的信息来调用 方法来初始化 。The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the method to initialize the by using information in your application configuration file. 此方法可识别以下 Web 设置服务配置特性：This method recognizes the following Web settings service configuration attributes: - namename - descriptiondescription - connectionStringNameconnectionStringName - serviceUriserviceUri 有关这些属性的详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services)。For more information about these attributes, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services).

is .

summary.span: 将所有用户设置都重置为其默认值。

span.span: Resets all user settings to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由应用程序设置系统在内部使用，不应由应用程序代码使用。This method is used internally by the application settings system and it not meant to be used by your application code. 若要将 Web 设置重置为其默认值，通常会使用项目的 `Settings` 类的 方法（通常作为中的 `Properties.Settings.Default` C# ，并 `My.Settings` Visual Basic）。To reset Web settings to their default values, you will typically use the method of your project's `Settings` class (typically accessed as `Properties.Settings.Default` in C# and `My.Settings` in Visual Basic). 还可以通过调用 方法，将 Web 设置还原为以前缓存的值。You can also revert Web settings to the previously cached values by calling the method.

exception.span: 属性值为 ，而 位置的 Web 设置服务不可用。

summary.span: 获取或设置 Web 设置服务位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web settings service location.
The URI of the Web settings service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在应用程序代码中设置 属性，但通常会在应用程序配置文件中设置该值。You can set the property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file. 这样，便可以在不重新编译代码的情况下更改服务位置。This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code. 以编程方式设置服务位置时，必须指定完整的服务 URI，该 URI 将始终以 "Profile_JSON_AppService axd" 结尾。When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Profile_JSON_AppService.axd". > [!NOTE] > 此类包含类级别的链接要求，该请求应用于所有成员。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands). ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此属性以编程方式设置 Web 设置服务位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the Web settings service location. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#303](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#303)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#303](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#303)]

summary.span: 在设置提供程序尝试将属性值保存到 Web 设置服务时发生。

span.span: Occurs after the settings provider attempts to save the property values to the Web settings service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在设置提供程序访问设置服务之后发生，即使未成功保存设置也是如此。This event occurs after the settings provider accesses the settings service, even if the settings were not successfully saved. 提供程序可能无法保存设置的一个原因是当前用户已注销。您可以使用 属性来确定是否未成功保存任何设置。One reason that the provider might fail to save the settings is if the current user has been logged out. You can use the property to determine whether any settings were not successfully saved. 如果设置提供程序无法访问设置服务，则不会发生此事件，而是使提供程序引发 。This event does not occur if the settings provider cannot access the settings service, which instead causes the provider to throw a . ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此事件来显示未成功保存的设置的列表。The following example code demonstrates how to use this event to display a list of settings that were not successfully saved. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#304)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#304](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#304)]
